Job Title: Product Manager - Hydraulics, EV Battery

Location: Springfield, MO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Manufacturing, Product Management, Sales

Description:
The Product Manager is responsible for managing the income statement, balance sheet and cash flow drivers for their product lines by controlling the product from the launch phase, core management through the sale to the dealer and life cycle in the market. Product line ownership includes product development, pricing, cataloging, promotion, forecasting and inventory management. Position will work closely with various departments including the Reman Technical Center (RTC), Dealer Development, P&S Marketing, Engineering, Manufacturing, Supply Chain, Core Management, Quality, Cost Accounting and other Product Managers to increase revenue and margin growth while maximizing return on investment (ROI).
Essential Responsibilities:The Product Manager will make critical decisions for strategic initiatives to drive growth for their product line. This position is assigned quarterly and annual objectives. Make decisions that generate working capital, improves availability, fill rate performance, schedule integrity, increased absorption.
